title: Add manual login/registration with email+password and full mobile responsive pass

requirements.text: Add a manual email/password login and registration system to the site. The login page must present two options: (1) Manual login with email and password fields and a 'Login' button, and (2) Internet Identity (existing). The registration page must present two options: (1) Manual registration with name, email, password, and confirm password fields and a 'Register' button, and (2) Internet Identity. Both pages must be clearly laid out so regular users and the admin can easily understand and use them. The admin can use username 'admin' and password 'Bonitara@2024' via the manual login path. Store registered user credentials in the Motoko backend and validate login against stored records.

quotes: When I click on login so give me manual login as well so I can add id and password and for first give registration option with manual and google as well so easy to mine for admin login and easy to people proper understanding

acceptanceCriteria: Login page shows two tabs or sections: 'Manual Login' (email + password) and 'Internet Identity'
Registration page shows two tabs or sections: 'Manual Registration' (name, email, password, confirm password) and 'Internet Identity'
Submitting the manual registration form saves the user in the Motoko backend and redirects to the profile page
Submitting the manual login form validates credentials against the backend and redirects authenticated users to their profile/account page
Admin can log in with username 'admin' and password 'Bonitara@2024' via the manual login form
Invalid credentials show a clear error message on the login form
Password mismatch during registration shows a validation error
Authenticated users are redirected away from login/register pages
Unauthenticated users accessing protected pages (Profile, OrderHistory) are redirected to the login page
Both login and registration pages are mobile-responsive and properly styled with the BONITARA luxury theme

requirements.text: Perform a comprehensive mobile and responsive layout pass across all pages of the BONITARA site. Every page — Home, Category, ProductDetail, Cart, Checkout, Profile, OrderHistory, Blog, Wholesale, FAQ, ShippingPolicy, Terms, ReturnPolicy, ContactUs, and AdminDashboard — must render correctly and without overflow, broken grids, or misaligned elements on mobile (320px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1280px+) breakpoints. All interactive elements (buttons, cards, modals, dropdowns, forms, navigation menus) must have touch-friendly tap targets (minimum 44px). Images must resize correctly without distortion. Font sizes must scale appropriately across breakpoints. The hamburger mobile menu must open and close correctly. Modals and overlays must display properly on small screens.

quotes: After finish this process please make pac and mobile fully responsive web app so easy to use in any device

acceptanceCriteria: All pages render without horizontal overflow on 320px wide screens
All product grids reflow to 1 column on mobile, 2 columns on tablet, and 3-4 columns on desktop
All buttons and interactive elements have a minimum touch target size of 44px height
The Header hamburger menu opens and closes the mobile navigation drawer correctly on all pages
Images on all pages scale proportionally and do not overflow their containers
Headings and body text use appropriate font sizes at each breakpoint (no tiny or oversized text)
Modals (cart, filters, etc.) display correctly and are scrollable on mobile screens
The checkout form, contact form, wholesale form, and all other forms are fully usable on mobile
The Admin Dashboard tabs and tables are accessible and usable on mobile (scrollable tables or stacked layout)
No broken grid layouts or misaligned sections exist on any page at any tested breakpoint
All CSS transitions and hover effects on cards, buttons, and navigation remain smooth and functional

constraints: Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
Keep all Motoko logic in the single main actor at backend/main.mo
Internet Identity login option must remain functional alongside the new manual login
Admin credentials must remain: username 'admin', password 'Bonitara@2024'
Maintain the existing BONITARA luxury theme (ivory/beige/soft gold/charcoal palette, Cormorant Garamond + Jost typography)
nonGoals: OAuth/Google Sign-In integration (not supported by the platform)
Email verification or password reset flows via external email services
Changes to existing product data or backend review/rating logic
